title: Agent Builder
description:
Build AI Agents using LLMs, frameworks like LangChain and LlamaIndex,
and technologies like Graph RAG, Reranker, and Retriever

shareChatbot.publicTooltip: Making public will allow anyone to access the chatbot without authentication
shareChatbot.title: Title
shareChatbot.welcomePlaceholder: Hello! This is custom welcome message
shareChatbot.showAgentReasoning: Show agent reasonings when using Multi-AgentsFlow
shareChatbot.startNewSession: Start new session when chatbot link is opened or refreshed

embedChat.instructions: Paste this anywhere in the <body> tag

apiCode.authWarning: You cannot use API key while embedding/sharing chatbot. Please select "No Authorization" under agent builder configuration authorization.
apiCode.overrideDescription: You can override existing input configuration of the agent builder with overrideConfig property.
apiCode.overrideWarning: For security reason, override config is disabled by default. Turn this feature on under agent builder configuration.
apiCode.multipleValuesInfo: You can also specify multiple values for a config parameter by specifying the node id
apiCode.streamInfo: Read here on how to stream response back to application
